website_summaries.verdict: A stylish, modern pattern that looks as nice as it feels.
pros: Microfiber material is soft, airy, and hypoallergenic
Blanket is plush without being too heavy
Sits at an affordable price point

customer_reviews.title: So fluffy and looks just like the picture!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter set, soft yet feels durable, super fluffy and comfortable to sleep with! Looks just like the picture! 😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!  Best comforter ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER been more pleased with a comforter pillow case set!!! Not only does this look amazing in our bedroom but it is unbelievably comfortable!! The tag reads Wake Up In A Cloud and seriously this couldn't be more true! Though I've never slept on a cloud, I would imagine this close to how it feels! It is so soft, poofy and even warm! To top it off it washes easily with no ink bleeding AND it covers our entire king bed and then some....I could not be happier sleep is amazing with this!!! A must buy:)
customer_reviews.author: TaLana Holman

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and beautiful. I would recommend going a size up. I purchased the cal king for my reg king and it fits perfect. Lays over each side about 14” (guessing) just to the top of side boards. I won’t be purchasing $300 comforter sets anymore. This one is just as good and for $65 I can pass it to someone else when I’m ready for a different look. I’m already looking at purchasing another set for my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Super soft. Used for the first time last night and it was wonderful. Definitely breathable. 10/10 would buy again. It comes in a vacuum sealed package so don’t freak out when you get a super small package lol! It fluffed out perfectly. We got king size but have a queen size bed because we are both blanket hogs so yes it is long. Looks just like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron G

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkley but great!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful. I love the look. I expected it to be softer, however I’ve only had it out of the bag for a bit so it might just need to relax. It came vacuum sealed so all the air was out (to make it fit in smaller packaging) however this gave it wrinkles which I’m not a Huge fan of. I am going to give it a wash to get those out. The pillow cases have a little pocket to keep your pillow in place, which I didn’t notice right away and was annoyed that they were short on my pillows! But they fit perfectly with the pocket in place. I would give this 5 stars ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Mak

customer_reviews.title: Fades... looks terrible
customer_reviews.text: Overall, when I first opened the product, I liked it. I washed the comforter one time, cold water, minimal soap and noticed a little grey part after drying it and shrugged it off. I washed the comforter this past weekend and it completely started showing the fade again. Terrible. I don't use bleach at all, I wash it alone, gentle cycle. This is what happened.. Beware. The comforter is comfortable and all but now looks awful. Hoping for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Calveeno

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles easy/collects dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I first was not impressed with this comforter. I got the white marble one. Now that I have had it for a little over a month I can say it is not bad for the price. I don’t like the feel of the fabric as it is not exactly soft. I don’t see that it will hold up very well if washed. It diffidently collects dog hair. The pattern is very cute. It also wrinkles easy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter
customer_reviews.text: The product is super nice. It's well made and comfortable to sleep with. However, it is light weight and should be used in the spring and summer. I think most people would like how light weight and comfortable it is but I happen to be anemic and am always cold. My feet and hands have difficulty staying warm so this was a small problem for me. Overall great product
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMFORTER I’VE EVER PURCHASED
customer_reviews.text: You’ll receive your comforter and pillow shams in a vacuum sealed double bagged zip up plastic case. At first I was very nervous that I may have accidentally purchased a duvet again, however this is a full comforter with a marble print. • SUPER SOFT • Fluffy but not obnoxious, so it’s perfect for adding accent pillows and/ or throws • Beautiful print • Pillow shams easily keep your pillows in place
customer_reviews.author: hk

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled, Lumpy, and Small
customer_reviews.text: Very wrinkly...it’s practically impossible to get all of the wrinkles out. The stuffing also bunches up in places and doesn’t spread out evenly - making the bed look lumpy and disheveled. The sizing was also off. I bought this to go on my king size bed and it barely covers the top of the mattress. The fabric is really soft, but doesn’t make up for the other issues.
customer_reviews.author: Heather King

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice for the price !!!
customer_reviews.text: Logistics: The shipping was really fast. I received it two days after ordering. Product: The comforter come well packaged. It come in three different bags two of which are vacuum sealed. I have a King size bed but I ordered a Cal-King because I wanted it longer. I'm glad I did because it's still short on the sides(as pictured). I would definitely say order a size up. It comes really flat from being sealed. After seeing how it fit my bed I took it off and washed and dried it. It fluffed up nicely but in two areas the lining has brunched up and I can fix it. Overall it's a nice comforter for the price.
customer_reviews.author: joseynikki

customer_reviews.title: Soft and durable
customer_reviews.text: The quality is great. It had a silky softness Also it was very warm My children share a room boy/girl. My son added black decor and my daughter did pale pink. And I wasted several times and still retained it shape and softness
customer_reviews.author: Azeem Khawaja

customer_reviews.title: Smell, Beware of the Smell
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why, but when I opened up the comforter set it came in a horrendous smell. I had to wash it 9 times, place it outside wrapped up in baking soda for 3 days and wash it with pine sol to get the smell out. Don't keep scrolling through the reviews thinking that it might not happen to you, because that's what happen to me. I advise you to skip out on this purchase and go somewhere else. Please!
customer_reviews.author: Chichi

customer_reviews.title: Deceptively large!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before our new bed came. We were preciously sleeping on a queen and just upgraded to a Cali King. We used this comforter on our queen while we waited for the new bed and I fell in love. It's a lighter comforter but it's warm and sooooo comfortable. It fit our queen well so I was worried it would be too small for a Cali King but as you can see it fits our Cali King perfectly!! It isn't long on the sides, so I'd recommend a bed skirt or something if that bothers you but it keeps us converted and warm all night so we're very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Townsend

customer_reviews.title: So comfy !
customer_reviews.text: My husband was tired of me buying “feminine” bed sets so I went with one that I thought was perfect for both of us. The blanket is thin but we are both always hot so it’s perfect in my opinion. It looks great with our headboard and has held up great after multiple washes. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: So nice and light weight! I read some reviews about the comforter having wrinkles which is true but the company gives you a card with instructions to help get rid of the wrinkles!! I have a king but ordered a California King size and it fits just right. I would recommend buying the California King if you have a king.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Soto

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great comforter...until it rips multiple times.
customer_reviews.text: This is a warm comforter with a pretty design. But it doesn’t last.... first time I washed it was great no issues. Second time it ripped a huge hole in it. The fabric is very cheap and tears so easily. I now have 3 holes in this comforter from washing it. I wish the quality of this was better because I liked it a lot. Unfortunately it’s been a waste of money as I need to get a new comforter after only a month of having it.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay , beware of stains
customer_reviews.text: Has a big pink stain , why am I paying $69 for a comforter for it to come stained. Other then that it’s a pretty comforter as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: Armani

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE SMELL
customer_reviews.text: soft and loved the design but had the WORSE SMELL EVER, it stunk up my entire room , I washed it twice, hung it outside to dry and still can’t get it out. do not purchase, waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: great price and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This comforter hasn't fallen apart after washing and is very lightweight as well as warm without being hot. Perfect for florida.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & Quality
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is gorgeous, its so soft & well made! Also, affordable. Just what i was looking for, love it. I have a full size bed & ordered a queen.. still fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Bri.G

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful comfort, but I’ve only had it for a few Months and after a couple washes the material on the inside balls up and makes it look lumpy. That’s a sad thing to happen since it is such a pretty comforter..
customer_reviews.author: Mmelott

customer_reviews.title: Very nice comforter
customer_reviews.text: Read other reviews before order. Comforter arrived intact, well packaged, & in timely manner. Looks great on bed. Have queen bed, but like others purchased king size. Recommend product
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be better quality
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful set; however, after washing it the comforter, it now has lumps all through out. This set was $70 and for that price I expected more. I’m so upset I waited to open it and now the return date has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Jazz Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: its a bit hefty, but who doesn't want that in a comforter? I've washed it several times, it hasn't lost it's color or fluff. its a perfect addition to my bedroom. I got a cal king for my queen sized bed... I like how well it covers my extremely tall mattress and boxspring. Will definitely be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannessyo

customer_reviews.title: The size is way off.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because my wife really liked the pattern. I read the reviews prior to purchase and kept seeing that the comforter is to small. It definitely is. The reason I gave three stars is because it is still very good quality ad comfortable but I would recommend you don't buy if your purchasing for a King bed. If your wife tells you that there is always a few bad reviews show her this because that's what mine does.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel, but I washed it once and the white isn’t as bright. Looks faded or the black/grey colors blended into the white part. Still currently using it, just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline H

customer_reviews.title: I am absoultey in love with this bedset
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed set and its already a year old! This bedding hides a lot of things and is super comfy! Defiantly would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Balewski

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: !Beware! I bought a Cali king for my queen size bed as both my boyfriend and I are blanket hogs and it fits like a queen size would so it’s definitely small. Feels like it will be comfortable to sleep with in the summer time and it’s not nearly as fluffy as it looks in the picture I prefer a thicker quality blanket and this one feels nice but is definitely not what I think of when I think comforter quality. I love the marble design. Overall it’s not bad I will be keeping it
customer_reviews.author: Jerimarie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Nice Soft Comforter
customer_reviews.text: This comforter is nicely fluffy and warm, and I love the design. FYI, the background is more gray that white. My only advice is to order up in size: I have a high Queen bed and ordered a King, and it just barely covers the box springs.
customer_reviews.author: BMS

customer_reviews.title: Stitching Unraveled
customer_reviews.text: I bought this time May 23,2020. I have washed it twice. The first time, I noticed it shrunk a bit but still fit m bed. I washed the comforter today and I stitching has come apart. I can now see the filler. I am so disappointed. I paid too much money. Now, I have to purchase another one but I wont purchase it from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nevalo

customer_reviews.title: Nice comforter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comforter for the price .. just what I expected. Fits my king perfectly.The only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is bc it has a slight smell. I washed it hoping that would make it go away but it didn’t .. hopefully a couple more washes will do the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and perfect light weight for living in a hot desert. Not super soft but I don’t like super soft anyways. Good sleek texture. Wish it came with sheets but bought some grey ones for $10.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Pleasently surprised
customer_reviews.text: This was even prettier in person. Added a touch of elegance to a guest bedroom. Love the look and feel. Washed up nicely and the wrinkles flattened out quickly after sitting for an hour on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Scovill

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight yet warm. The look is beautiful. My bed is a full size and I ordered a queen, very happy I did so it’s just a little oversized. Oh and my two pups also approve!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & cute
customer_reviews.text: I really love this comforter it’s so cute and comfortable i ordered a size bigger then what I needed so it’s bigger and it turned out so good.
customer_reviews.author: Sahara

customer_reviews.title: Overall pleased
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this comforter set at a 4. I wish it was a little heavier. It also has a slight smell from the packaging. I will probably have to wash it to get rid of the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Peters

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but thin
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and love it so much ! But a down side to this is it’s pretty thin and not insulated well, if you run cold it’s not the blanket for you unless you double layer your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Canterbury

customer_reviews.title: Bad Smell That Won’t Wash Out
customer_reviews.text: It smells horrible. I washed it twice (so far) and the STRONG mildew/chemical smell will not go away. Unfortunately, we didn’t get our bed until after the return window closed so I was unaware of the smell since it comes vacuum sealed and I just opened it yesterday. Frustrated because that’s money wasted and I really did like the pattern of the comforter. Also, it is thin. Not fluffy like a normal comforter- closer to the thickness of a Walmart value comforter, but not even as soft as those.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my king size bed and it barely fit it was really disappointing. It also was not very soft at all. It’s pretty but not soft. This was not what I expected it to be!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the picture! It's gorgeous and of great quality. Not too heavy, but still nice and plush. The marble pattern on the fabric is printed on, but done really well. It's really neat and clean print work printed on both sides of the comforter. Absolutely beautiful. The comforter also came with 2 pillowcases, which was a nice surprise due to the fact that I wasn't expecting them. It came vacuum sealed so it takes a few days to unwrinkle, but once it does, its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this spread! It is so cute, lightweight, and still very warm. I sleep with my window open even during the winter and this keeps me very cozy. Also, it looks exactly like the pictures, and is very nice material. Overall very happy for the quality, especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Largent

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: My college-age son moved into his first off-campus home , and likes this entire ensemble very much.
customer_reviews.author: minmi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Deceptively warm. Feels lightweight but it is quiet warm at night. Super snuggly. Pretty king shams.
customer_reviews.author: Anm

customer_reviews.title: Puts the comfort in comforter
customer_reviews.text: Comfiest comforter we’ve had. We had the same comforter for 5 years and I’m happy to say this is what we upgraded to. It’s cute, great quality, and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally perfect for me!!! I sleep very hot and this is like a light down comforter so its perfect! Fluffy but not too much, I have washed it twice now and the stuffing hasn't moved! I would definitely buy this
customer_reviews.author: Malina

customer_reviews.title: Literally like sleeping on a cloud!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the King Size Marble Comforter and we love it. It is so soft and cozy, plus it looks beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's not the most high quality comforter but for the price its good. Very pretty and my daughter loves it so that's all that matters!
customer_reviews.author: Karie Sturdevant

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the name for sure. It’s so fluffy and comfortable. The color and print is exactly like the picture. So happy that I bought this. I gave it four stars because it is definitely not wrinkle resistant like they claim. Mine was covered in wrinkles. Other than that for the price it is amazing! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Not the best comforter
customer_reviews.text: I have already had to return this comforter because it ripped. I got the new one and it ripped as well. I’m very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lawson

customer_reviews.title: A lightweight all-season comforter
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this comforter for long but it does look and feel amazing. It's soft and lightweight especially for a blanket this size in my opinion. I was worried about the thickness not being enough to stay warm but it's very nice and still breathes when it gets warm. The pillow cases are also awesome, because they're the ones with the inside flap so the pillowcase is more stealthy.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Love, but gave 4 stars because it tore in the washer the first time washed. I had to sew it back up.
customer_reviews.author: AlcazarStar

customer_reviews.title: Overall, I’m pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: As other people have stated, this comforter is very wrinkle-prone. Even after putting it to de wrinkle in the dryer, it comes out with wrinkles! Other than that, the comforter design is very cute! It’s also lightweight but keeps me warm at the same time. Overall, I’m pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Olivares

customer_reviews.title: 💯
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have anything bad to say about this purchase. It’s soft, chic, and so comfortable. My husband and I both love it. When you take it out of the box it’s going to be flat because it’s been folded and vacuum sealed. If you follow the directions on the tag your first wash/dry it really will come out fluffy so don’t be discouraged!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This is just as pictured. Love it. It is average to light weight and very warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this marble comforter set for my daughter-in-law for her birthday and she really loved it , I would buy it again. I would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: This was well worth the price and looks like I paid a pretty penny for it. I paired it with silk grey sheets and it makes the entire room brighter.
customer_reviews.author: Renrick K.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this comforter to be so comfy and thick for the price I paid for it. It was delivered in a small package that looked like a pack of sheets, and when you open it up it expands a lot! I washed and dried it before making my bed with it and it grew so much it the dryer! Awesome quality and awesome price!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Terrell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Still cute though
customer_reviews.text: It’s a super nice comforter it’s more for looks then anything. I feel like it was a bit to pricy for what I actually got. I have a king size bed an it does not fit like the picture shows. Id recommend getting a size bigger if you want that flow-e look. Still cute though
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: like everything about the set except it does not fit the be well. Got a blanket from costco which fits great, this is too small
customer_reviews.author: Duff

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this comforter! Once I laid eyes on this one, everything else seemed inferiorm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s really cute. I have a California king mattress, but the unfortunate thing is the blanket does not cover the sides of the bed as it should. Other then that, it’s very cute and soft
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally leave reviews but this one definitely deserved one. I’ve been searching for two years for the perfect comforter I can tell already that this will be great for summer and also winter. I love this comforter and will definitely be ordering again and different styles
customer_reviews.author: dana dannolfo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly as described. Fits my king bed perfectly. It’s light weight and soft. It looks exactly like the picture. I am very happy with it and would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Giardinelli

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had way more expensive comforters and this is by far the softest!! Be careful cutting it open it comes vacuum sealed. To fluff it up I followed the wash and dry instructions exactly and I LOVE LOVE it and it’s still light weight but can also keep you warm!
customer_reviews.author: Brina H

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMFORTER FOR PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the king size comforter and it literally is one of the best comforters I've ever purchased and for such a cheap price. It's very durable. I've washed it multiple times already and no wear and tear. It's a little too warm for summer but overall I am so pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Carr

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I’ve been obsessed with rose gold and marble lately. I made some wall art to match the comforter. It’s perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: lakevia

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Definitely really comfortable!!! Not as light weight as I’d like but looks great on the bed. Order a size up!! I have a king bed and ordered a Cali king. Fits perfect, can’t imagine if I actually ordered a king. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Gina Rico

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Comforter is really fluffy. Really feels like waking up in clouds. keeps you warm at night, but still very light. I bought a Cal. king for my king size bed. It fit perfectly. I highly recommend going up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Sienna Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and just like the pictures. However, it is quite warm. I’m the type that has to sleep with a comforter and this is just not ideal for summer. Looking forward to colder months.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: It's exactly what I was hoping for.  It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my master King size bed. I ordered a California King size and it fits perfect. I highly recommend this comforter. It's brand new. I'm not sure how it will turn out after washing, but I will be mindful and use the delicate cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Miss D

customer_reviews.title: it's good
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was a little softer but it is exactly as it looks. I think it's a tiny bit overpriced but that's just how things go these days.
customer_reviews.author: Hananza

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it’s a comfortable comforter. It isn’t as fluffy as I would had liked it. Yet, good quality
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: Spare bedroom with twin bed, blends nicely with the ombre curtains and area rug I ordered. Very nice comforter
customer_reviews.author: Jeickhoff

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Doesn’t fit a king like ordered... Very light weight and doesn’t keep you warm in the cold nights. I want to return it, but I like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a YES!
customer_reviews.text: Big and comfortable and great quality for the price !
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute comforter
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my daughter and she loves it. Great Quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Charissa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Huge rip
customer_reviews.text: I liked the comforter very much HOWEVER it has a huge rip in it already and because it’s brand new I feel like it must’ve come like that because the blanket rarely gets used and I had the rip on the underneath of the blanket so I didn’t see it til I went to wash it
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: I love my new comforter set!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten nothing but compliments about my marble comforter set. It is extremely soft and comfortable. I have not had to clean it yet but that is in the near future. I LOOOOOOOOOVE my comforter!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is super soft! I cannot get over how soft it is! I washed it immediately after receiving it in the mail, and it washed really nice! Cannot wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I love getting into bed!! They are so fluffy and cozy and perfect for my taste. They keep you warm but they don’t make you sweat!
customer_reviews.author: James Biven

customer_reviews.title: Great comforter
customer_reviews.text: Arrived vacuum sealed so wasn’t sure what to expect. Nice quality and very warm. Daughter loves hers (twin size).
customer_reviews.author: Ashley_W

customer_reviews.title: Cute cheap bedspread!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bedspread set for our guest bedroom. Would not say it is the best quality, but it is good quality for the price. Came with pillow cases and the comforter. Would be cute in a teenagers bedroom, looks modern. Smells a little plasticty.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Be more clear when selling a product on line when you can’t see it in person.
customer_reviews.text: The pic shows a Comforter with two Shams? But they were two pillow cases? No sheets to match the Comforter and no Shams? Who sells a Comforter with two pillow cases? Crazy! Not happy to say the least......I would buy the Shams and sheets if I knew where I could purchase them? Not looking for something for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Totally wake up in clouds
customer_reviews.text: Super absolutely love this comforter, it’s soft and super light
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike! It does NOT come with sheets. Just fyi!
customer_reviews.author: Rose E Collins

customer_reviews.title: Dream Come True!
customer_reviews.text: This is my DREAM blanket! It is so fluffy and comforter. I am always nervous to purchase comforters online but this is one is everything and more. We have a king sized bed and ordered a California King comforter. It does not really fit BUT I am glad I went up a size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful comforter, looks terrific, but the material is a little scratchier than expected. Still extremely comfortable though. Nice a fluffy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter. Its very nice and it fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Super cute and just like the picture! Soft and findable
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Musa

customer_reviews.title: Love this comforter :)
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this comforter. It's light weight, yet keeps you warm and it's soft. It also looks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Nolfi

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the pics
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, looks just like the pictures, it was vacuum sealed to fit into a smaller package so it’s kinda wrinkle when it comes out of the bag, but I still like it overall 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but...
customer_reviews.text: Stitching throughout the comforter are loose and defective. It did not have matching skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: SUPER comfortable and keeps its shape. A little heavier than what I was expecting, however, its true to size and picture in gray. Would buy again in future.
customer_reviews.author: holly marquart

customer_reviews.title: Looked cool but not really worth it
customer_reviews.text: Washed it right away like it says on the tag and it ripped open. Sent it back and USPS lost the replacement in the mail lol then Amazon lost the return. Feel like this blanket is cursed. Poor material poor experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Too small for my king bed
customer_reviews.text: Too small for my king bed. I'm thinking because my bed sits high but even so it fit smaller than a queen size comforter I have. I recommend ordering the California king for a king size bed
customer_reviews.author: alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not lightweight at all!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this specifically because it was supposed to be a lightweight comforter for summer. This is definitely not what I would consider "lightweight". We kept it because I like the design and plan on using it again in the colder months.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition To My Bed!
customer_reviews.text: Love this comforter. The design is beautiful and it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Catherina

customer_reviews.title: So soft!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! So soft and comfy, it’s a little wrinkly when opened but give it a few hours and fluff it and it looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great comforter for me. It is light (which I love) and puffed up nicely when taken out of the bag. Color is beautiful. No problem at all with the shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Wake In Cloud - Marble Comforter Set, Gray Grey Black and White Pattern Printed, Soft Microfiber Bedding (3pcs, King Size)
product_meta.description:
Size:King| Color:White

Set Includes
1 x Comforter
2 x Pillow Cases


Size Information
Twin - comforter 68" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 26".
Full - comforter 80" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 26".
Queen - comforter 90" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 26".
King - comforter 104" x 90", pillow cases 20" x 36".
California King - comforter 104" x 98", pillow cases 20" x 36".


Easy Care
Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry on low or dry naturally, do not bleach.


Guarantee
100% satisfaction with 30 night trial, return for full refund if you don’t entirely love.
feature_bullets: 【Design】Marble pattern print in black white and gray grey. Simple modern gift idea for teens, boys, girls, men or women.
【Set】1 comforter 104x90 inches (king size), 2 pillow cases 20x36 inches.
【Material】100% soft microfiber, durable, hypoallergenic, wrinkle-resistant, fade-resistant and machine washable.
【Easy Care】Machine wash in cold water, gentle cycle, tumble dry on low or dry naturally, do not bleach.
【Other Products】Please search code in brackets for matching Pillow Cases (B07GSTXVJV), matching Sheets (B07Z8SK7GN).
